Package game.gameactors.allyorinvader

Class Invader

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.gameactors.enemies.NPC
game.gameactors.allyorinvader.Invader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, DeathRuneDroppper, Resettable
public class Invader
extends NPC
implements Resettable, DeathRuneDroppper
The Invader class represents an invader character in a game. It extends the NPC class and implements the Resettable, DeathRuneDroppper.
See Also:
NPC, Resettable, DeathRuneDroppper
